NPS = % Promoters - % Detractors: The "Human Factor" Sustains the Score: Almost all employees (including detractors) mention that the human team and technical challenges are excellent. This is what prevents the NPS from falling into negative territory.
Leadership Gap: There is a recurring complaint regarding "new leaders" or middle management who are perceived as disconnected from the daily workflow, creating a gap between direction and execution.
Expectation Management: Both Promoters and Passives agree that the recruitment process does not always reflect the reality of the position, leading to early disillusionment.

Well-being vs. Productivity: A pattern of stress and lack of work-life balance is detected in the 2025 comments, suggesting that the current workload may not be sustainable for long-term talent retention.
